transcripts.speaker: system
transcripts.text: This call may be recorded for quality assurance and training purposes. By remaining on the line, you consent to this recording. If you do not consent, please hang up now.

transcripts.speaker: system
transcripts.text: Thank you for answering. Please leave a message after the beep.

transcripts.speaker: caller
transcripts.text: Hello, I need help with my account.

transcripts.speaker: caller
transcripts.text: I've been trying to reset my password but I keep getting an error message.

transcripts.speaker: caller
transcripts.text: The error says my email address is not recognized.

transcripts.speaker: caller
transcripts.text: I signed up about three months ago.

transcripts.speaker: caller
transcripts.text: And I was able to log in fine until last week.

transcripts.speaker: caller
transcripts.text: I've checked my spam folder and I'm not receiving the password reset emails either.

transcripts.speaker: caller
transcripts.text: Can someone please call me back at this number to help resolve this issue?

transcripts.speaker: caller
transcripts.text: My account number is 1234567890 if that helps.

transcripts.speaker: caller
transcripts.text: Thank you for your help. I look forward to hearing from you soon.
